meta.description: Contains metadata information for the resume

format.description: The canonical resume format and version. E.g. 'PRTFLIO@0.0.1'.

version.description: The semantic version number for this resume. E.g. 0.0.1

basics.description: Your basic information like the name, a label, an image, summary, quote, contact information, location information and social media profiles.

name.description: The candidate's name as it should appear on the resume.

label.description: A label for this resume, such as 'Full-Stack Developer'.

image.description: URL or path to your picture in JPEG, PNG, GIF, or BMP format.

summary.description: A short description or summary of yourself as a candidate.

contact.description: Contact information, including phone numbers, emails, websites, IMs, and custom contact types.

location.description: Location information, like address, country, region, city etc.

social.description: Social networking services and communities including GitHub, FaceBook, and the like.

network.description: The name of the social network.

user.description: Your user name, number or identifier on this network.

icon.description: The icon of the social network.

url.description: URL of your profile page on this network.

position.description: Your position or formal job title.

summary.description: A summary of your achievements and responsibilities under this employer.

items.description: For ex, 'Led 5-person development team, increasing profits by 50% year-over-year'.

location.description: Freeform location of the job or position, e.g., 'San Francisco, CA' or 'Tokyo'.

items.description: For example, C++, HTML, HIPAA, etc.

education.description: Your formal education, e.g. college and university.

title.description: A freeform title for this education stint. Typically, this should be the short name of your degree, certification, or training.

curriculum.description: Notable courses, subjects, and educational experiences.

items.description: The course name and number or other identifying info.

url.description: Website or URL of the institution or school.

summary.description: A short summary of this education experience.

keywords.description: Keywords associated with this education stint.

items.description: For example, C++, HTML, HIPAA, etc.
For ex, 'Graduated *summa cum laude*'.

location.description: Freeform location of the education, e.g., 'San Francisco, CA' or 'Tokyo'.

projects.description: The personal projects you worked on.

images.description: Images and screenshots of the project

thumbnail.description: Thumbnail of the image with 300px width and 300px height

big.description: The image in its original size

start.description: Date your work on the project began

end.description: Date your work on the project ended

items.description: For ex, '#1 app on Itunes in the Fitness category'.
For example, C++, HTML, HIPAA, etc.

openSource.description: The open-source projects you worked on or contributed to.

summary.description: A summary of your achievements and responsibilities on the project.

role.description: Your role on the project: Contributor, Creator, etc.

start.description: Date your involvement with project began

end.description: Date your involvement with project ended

items.description: For ex, 'Active contributer to the project, with lots of issues raised and 7 pull-request accepted'.
For example, C++, HTML, HIPAA, etc.

name.description: Name of the skill: 'Programming', 'Frameworks', 'Programming Languages', 'Project Management' etc.

items.description: A keyword relating to this interest.

qualifications.description: Your qualifications for the job: e.g. certificates, test scores, continuing education, standalone programs and courses.

category.description: Type of qualification: test score, course, certificate, program etc.

from.description: Name of the company, insitution, individual or issuer of the qualification.

summary.description: A brief description of the qualification and why you received it.

url.description: A webpage or other associated URL.

recognition.description: Your public or professional plaudits, kudos, awards, and other forms of positive external reinforcement.

category.description: Type of recognition: award, honor, prize, etc.

title.description: Title of the award or recognition.

from.description: Name of the awarding company, insitution, or individual.

summary.description: A brief description of the award and why you received it.

url.description: A webpage or other associated URL.

writing.description: Your writing and publication history, from blogs and essays to novels and dissertations.

title.description: Title of the article, essay, or book.

url.description: Website or URL of this writing or publication.

summary.description: A brief summary of the publication.

reading.description: Your reading habits. It is intended to demonstrate familiarity with industry-relevant publications, blogs, books, or other media that a competent industry candidate should be expected to know.

title.description: Title of the book, blog, or article.

category.description: The type of reading: book, article, blog, magazine, series, etc.

url.description: URL of the book, blog, or article.

author.description: Author of the book, blog, or article.

summary.description: A brief description of the book, magazine, etc.

location.description: Freeform location of the event, e.g., 'San Francisco, CA' or 'Tokyo'.

items.description: An array of specific highlights such as 'Won 'Best Speaker' award at 2012 E3 expo'.

keywords.description: Keywords associated with this speaking engagement.

items.description: A list of keywords such as 'TED', 'E3', 'mathematics', 'Big Data', etc.

summary.description: A description of this speaking engagement.

url.description: A public URL to the patent details.

number.description: Number of the patent or patent application

status.description: Patent status, e.g. pending or granted

level.description: Level of fluency with the language, e.g. 'elementary', 'limited-working', 'professional-working', 'full-professional', 'native-or-bilingual'

interests.description: Your interests and enthusiasms outside of work.

name.description: The name or title of the interest or hobby.

extracurricular.description: Your involvement with industry-related events and enterprises outside of work. For example: attending conferences, workshops, or meetups.

location.description: City, state, or other freeform location.
